name: RedVGreen
description:
RedVsGreen is simple, fast paced 2-player battle game. Grab a random item out of 15 and launch it at your enemy while avoiding your enemies attacks. First to 3 kills wins!

Controls:

Player 1 (Green):

Move: W A S D
Use item: E

Player 2 (Red):

Use Item: SHIFT

Game is currently in version Beta 0-8-1
